links.title: CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt (NEMCL) with Underperform Recommendation
links.content:
# CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt () (NEMCL) with Underperform Recommendation

Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt (Common Stock)

OTCPK 

REAL TIME PRICE

EXTENDED HOURS

[Gold And Silver Mining](/industry/list/gold-and-silver-ores)  
---  
  
# CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt () (NEMCL) with Underperform Recommendation

[George Maybach](/author/5244)

2024-11-29 23:21

[US :NEMCL](/s/us/nemcl)

US 

Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, CLSA [initiated](https://fintel.io/sfo/us/nemcl) coverage of Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt () ([OTCPK:NEMCL](https://fintel.io/s/us/nemcl)) with a **Underperform** recommendation. 

**Analyst Price Forecast Suggests 20.19% Upside**

As of June 1, 2024, the average one-year [price target](https://fintel.io/sfo/us/nemcl) for Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt () is $49.73/share. The forecasts range from a low of $33.19 to a high of $77.69. The average price target represents an increase of 20.19% from its latest reported closing price of $41.38 / share. 

See our [leaderboard of companies](https://fintel.io/sfo) with the largest price target upside.

The projected annual revenue for Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt () is 16,283MM. The projected annual non-GAAP [EPS](https://fintel.io/seps/us/nemcl) is 1.95. 

**What is the Fund Sentiment?**

There are [51 funds or institutions reporting positions](https://fintel.io/so/us/nemcl) in Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt (). This is an decrease of 7 owner(s) or 12.07% in the last quarter. Average portfolio weight **of all funds** dedicated to NEMCL is 0.50%, an increase of 2.62%. Total shares owned by institutions decreased in the last three months by 24.35% to 5,679K shares. 

**What are Other Shareholders Doing?**

![NEMCL / Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt \(Common Stock\) Shares Held by Institutions](https://images.fintel.io/us-nemcl-so.png)

KGGAX - KOPERNIK GLOBAL ALL-CAP FUND SHARES holds 1,717K shares. No change in the last quarter. 

FKRCX - Franklin Gold & Precious Metals Fund holds 968K shares. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 1,005K shares , representing **a decrease** of 3.82%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in NEMCL by 7.91% over the last quarter. 

PRAFX - T. Rowe Price Real Assets Fund holds 911K shares. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 950K shares , representing **a decrease** of 4.24%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in NEMCL by 12.31% over the last quarter. 

KGIIX - KOPERNIK INTERNATIONAL FUND CLASS I SHARES holds 525K shares. No change in the last quarter. 

DFIEX - International Core Equity Portfolio - Institutional Class holds 193K shares. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 410K shares , representing **a decrease** of 112.69%. The firm **decreased** its portfolio allocation in NEMCL by 45.91% over the last quarter. 

**Newmont Background Information** (This description is provided by the company.)

newmont is the world’s leading gold company and a producer of copper, silver, zinc and lead. the company’s world-class portfolio of assets, prospects and talent is anchored in favorable mining jurisdictions in north america, south america, australia and africa. newmont is the only gold producer listed in the s&p 500 index and is widely recognized for its principled environmental, social and governance practices. the company is an industry leader in value creation, supported by robust safety standards, superior execution and technical proficiency. newmont was founded in 1921 and has been publicly traded since 1925. 

##### Stories by George Maybach

[CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont (SNSE:NEM) with Underperform Recommendation](/news/clsa-initiates-coverage-of-newmont-snse-nem-with-underperform-recommendation-735) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, CLSA initiated coverage of Newmont (SNSE:NEM) with a Underperform recommendation. 

[CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont (BRSE:NEM) with Underperform Recommendation](/news/clsa-initiates-coverage-of-newmont-brse-nem-with-underperform-recommendation-515) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, CLSA initiated coverage of Newmont (BRSE:NEM) with a Underperform recommendation. 

[HSBC Downgrades Autodesk (WBAG:ADSK)](/news/hsbc-downgrades-autodesk-wbag-adsk-471) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, HSBC downgraded their outlook for Autodesk (WBAG:ADSK) from Buy to Hold. 

[CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt () (ASX:NEM) with Underperform Recommendation](/news/clsa-initiates-coverage-of-newmont-corporation-depositary-receipt-asx-nem-with-underperform-recommendation-834) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, CLSA initiated coverage of Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt () (ASX:NEM) with a Underperform recommendation. 

[HSBC Downgrades HP (XTRA:7HP)](/news/hsbc-downgrades-hp-xtra-7hp-583) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, HSBC downgraded their outlook for HP (XTRA:7HP) from Buy to Hold. 

[HSBC Downgrades HP (SNSE:HPQCL)](/news/hsbc-downgrades-hp-snse-hpqcl-520) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, HSBC downgraded their outlook for HP (SNSE:HPQCL) from Buy to Hold. 

[HSBC Downgrades HP (SNSE:HPQ)](/news/hsbc-downgrades-hp-snse-hpq-455) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, HSBC downgraded their outlook for HP (SNSE:HPQ) from Buy to Hold. 

[HSBC Downgrades HP (BRSE:HPQ)](/news/hsbc-downgrades-hp-brse-hpq-96) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, HSBC downgraded their outlook for HP (BRSE:HPQ) from Buy to Hold. 

[B. Riley Securities Downgrades RumbleOn (RMBL)](/news/b-riley-securities-downgrades-rumbleon-rmbl-300) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, B. 

[HSBC Downgrades Autodesk (ADSK)](/news/hsbc-downgrades-autodesk-adsk-752) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, HSBC downgraded their outlook for Autodesk (NasdaqGS:ADSK) from Buy to Hold.

links.title: B. Riley Securities Downgrades RumbleOn (RMBL)
links.content:
# B. Riley Securities Downgrades RumbleOn (RMBL)

RumbleOn, Inc.

NasdaqCM 

REAL TIME PRICE

EXTENDED HOURS

[Computer Programming Serv...](/industry/list/computer-programming-services)  
---  
  
# B. Riley Securities Downgrades RumbleOn (RMBL)

[George Maybach](/author/5244)

2024-11-29 23:16

[US :RMBL](/s/us/rmbl)

US 

Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, B. Riley Securities downgraded their [outlook](https://fintel.io/sfo/us/rmbl) for RumbleOn ([NasdaqCM:RMBL](https://fintel.io/s/us/rmbl)) from **Buy** to **Neutral**. 

**Analyst Price Forecast Suggests 2.79% Downside**

As of November 21, 2024, the average one-year [price target](https://fintel.io/sfo/us/rmbl) for RumbleOn is $6.63/share. The forecasts range from a low of $5.56 to a high of $8.40. The average price target represents a decrease of 2.79% from its latest reported closing price of $6.82 / share. 

See our [leaderboard of companies](https://fintel.io/sfo) with the largest price target upside.

The projected annual revenue for RumbleOn is 1,998MM, an increase of 59.74%. The projected annual non-GAAP [EPS](https://fintel.io/seps/us/rmbl) is 2.32. 

**What is the Fund Sentiment?**

There are [141 funds or institutions reporting positions](https://fintel.io/so/us/rmbl) in RumbleOn. This is an increase of 45 owner(s) or 46.88% in the last quarter. Average portfolio weight **of all funds** dedicated to RMBL is 0.16%, an increase of 2.85%. Total shares owned by institutions increased in the last three months by 5.13% to 17,044K shares. ![RMBL / RumbleOn, Inc. Put/Call Ratios](https://images.fintel.io/us-rmbl-put-call-ratio-chart.png) The [put/call ratio](https://fintel.io/sopt/us/rmbl) of RMBL is 1.28, indicating a bearish outlook. 

**What are Other Shareholders Doing?**

![RMBL / RumbleOn, Inc. Shares Held by Institutions](https://images.fintel.io/us-rmbl-so.png)

Stone House Capital Management holds 6,409K shares representing 18.15% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 6,404K shares , representing **an increase** of 0.08%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in RMBL by 61.44% over the last quarter. 

Nantahala Capital Management holds 3,067K shares representing 8.68% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 4,417K shares , representing **a decrease** of 44.02%. The firm **decreased** its portfolio allocation in RMBL by 29.79% over the last quarter. 

Citigroup holds 1,702K shares representing 4.82% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 4K shares , representing **an increase** of 99.79%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in RMBL by 21,289.57% over the last quarter. 

Union Square Park Capital Management holds 1,120K shares representing 3.17% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 803K shares , representing **an increase** of 28.32%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in RMBL by 33.48% over the last quarter. 

BlackRock holds 837K shares representing 2.37% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 802K shares , representing **an increase** of 4.14%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in RMBL by 13.04% over the last quarter. 

**RumbleON Background Information** (This description is provided by the company.)

Founded in 2017, RumbleOn is an e-commerce company using innovative technology to aggregate and distribute pre-owned automotive and powersport vehicles to and from both consumers and dealers, 100% online. RumbleOn is disrupting the pre-owned vehicle supply chain by providing dealers with technology solutions such as virtual inventory, and a 24/7 distribution platform, and consumers with an efficient, timely and transparent transaction experience, without leaving home. Whether buying, selling, trading or financing a vehicle, RumbleOn enables dealers and consumers to transact without geographic boundaries in a transparent, fast and friction free experience. 

##### Stories by George Maybach

[CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont (SNSE:NEM) with Underperform Recommendation](/news/clsa-initiates-coverage-of-newmont-snse-nem-with-underperform-recommendation-735) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, CLSA initiated coverage of Newmont (SNSE:NEM) with a Underperform recommendation.

[HSBC Downgrades Autodesk (WBAG:ADSK)](/news/hsbc-downgrades-autodesk-wbag-adsk-471) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, HSBC downgraded their outlook for Autodesk (WBAG:ADSK) from Buy to Hold. 

[CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt () (ASX:NEM) with Underperform Recommendation](/news/clsa-initiates-coverage-of-newmont-corporation-depositary-receipt-asx-nem-with-underperform-recommendation-834) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, CLSA initiated coverage of Newmont Corporation - Depositary Receipt () (ASX:NEM) with a Underperform recommendation. 

[HSBC Downgrades HP (XTRA:7HP)](/news/hsbc-downgrades-hp-xtra-7hp-583) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, HSBC downgraded their outlook for HP (XTRA:7HP) from Buy to Hold. 

[HSBC Downgrades HP (SNSE:HPQCL)](/news/hsbc-downgrades-hp-snse-hpqcl-520) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, HSBC downgraded their outlook for HP (SNSE:HPQCL) from Buy to Hold. 

[HSBC Downgrades HP (SNSE:HPQ)](/news/hsbc-downgrades-hp-snse-hpq-455) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, HSBC downgraded their outlook for HP (SNSE:HPQ) from Buy to Hold. 

[HSBC Downgrades HP (BRSE:HPQ)](/news/hsbc-downgrades-hp-brse-hpq-96) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, HSBC downgraded their outlook for HP (BRSE:HPQ) from Buy to Hold.

links.title: HSBC Downgrades Autodesk (ADSK)
links.content:
# HSBC Downgrades Autodesk (ADSK)

Autodesk, Inc.

NasdaqGS 

REAL TIME PRICE

EXTENDED HOURS

[Prepackaged Software](/industry/list/prepackaged-software)  
---  
  
# HSBC Downgrades Autodesk (ADSK)

[George Maybach](/author/5244)

2024-11-29 22:08

[US :ADSK](/s/us/adsk)

US 

Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, HSBC downgraded their [outlook](https://fintel.io/sfo/us/adsk) for Autodesk ([NasdaqGS:ADSK](https://fintel.io/s/us/adsk)) from **Buy** to **Hold**. 

**Analyst Price Forecast Suggests 8.43% Upside**

As of November 21, 2024, the average one-year [price target](https://fintel.io/sfo/us/adsk) for Autodesk is $315.15/share. The forecasts range from a low of $259.57 to a high of $378.00. The average price target represents an increase of 8.43% from its latest reported closing price of $290.64 / share. 

See our [leaderboard of companies](https://fintel.io/sfo) with the largest price target upside.

The projected annual revenue for Autodesk is 6,264MM, an increase of 5.08%. The projected annual non-GAAP [EPS](https://fintel.io/seps/us/adsk) is 8.75. 

**What is the Fund Sentiment?**

There are [2,186 funds or institutions reporting positions](https://fintel.io/so/us/adsk) in Autodesk. This is an increase of 35 owner(s) or 1.63% in the last quarter. Average portfolio weight **of all funds** dedicated to ADSK is 0.08%, an increase of 76.53%. Total shares owned by institutions increased in the last three months by 0.55% to 219,472K shares. ![ADSK / Autodesk, Inc. Put/Call Ratios](https://images.fintel.io/us-adsk-put-call-ratio-chart.png) The [put/call ratio](https://fintel.io/sopt/us/adsk) of ADSK is 1.33, indicating a bearish outlook. 

**What are Other Shareholders Doing?**

![ADSK / Autodesk, Inc. Shares Held by Institutions](https://images.fintel.io/us-adsk-so.png)

BlackRock holds 19,117K shares representing 8.89% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 19,440K shares , representing **a decrease** of 1.69%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in ADSK by 1.54% over the last quarter. 

VTSMX - Vanguard Total Stock Market Index Fund Investor Shares holds 6,826K shares representing 3.17% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 6,759K shares , representing **an increase** of 0.99%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in ADSK by 5.61% over the last quarter. 

Loomis Sayles & Co L P holds 6,018K shares representing 2.80% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 6,195K shares , representing **a decrease** of 2.95%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in ADSK by 3.01% over the last quarter. 

VFINX - Vanguard 500 Index Fund Investor Shares holds 5,643K shares representing 2.62% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 5,490K shares , representing **an increase** of 2.70%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in ADSK by 5.30% over the last quarter. 

Price T Rowe Associates holds 5,396K shares representing 2.51% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 4,357K shares , representing **an increase** of 19.25%. The firm **decreased** its portfolio allocation in ADSK by 33.77% over the last quarter. 

**Autodesk Background Information** (This description is provided by the company.)

"Autodesk, Inc. makes software for people who make things. The company is a global leader in design and make software for architecture, engineering, construction, manufacturing, and media and entertainment industries. If you’ve ever driven a high-performance car, admired a towering skyscraper, used a smartphone, or watched a great film, chances are you’ve experienced what millions of Autodesk customers have built with its software. Autodesk exists to turn ideas into new realities that shape a thriving future. Its software and services harness emerging technologies—such as additive manufacturing (3D printing), artificial intelligence, generative design, and robotics—that give companies and individuals the power to work more quickly, effectively, and sustainably throughout the entire project lifecycle." 

##### Stories by George Maybach

links.title: CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont (NEM) with Underperform Recommendation
links.content:
# CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont (NEM) with Underperform Recommendation

Newmont Corporation

NYSE 

REAL TIME PRICE

EXTENDED HOURS

[Gold And Silver Mining](/industry/list/gold-and-silver-ores)  
---  
  
# CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont (NEM) with Underperform Recommendation

[George Maybach](/author/5244)

2024-11-29 21:35

[US :NEM](/s/us/nem)

US 

Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, CLSA [initiated](https://fintel.io/sfo/us/nem) coverage of Newmont ([NYSE:NEM](https://fintel.io/s/us/nem)) with a **Underperform** recommendation. 

**Analyst Price Forecast Suggests 44.07% Upside**

As of November 20, 2024, the average one-year [price target](https://fintel.io/sfo/us/nem) for Newmont is $60.57/share. The forecasts range from a low of $47.47 to a high of $84.00. The average price target represents an increase of 44.07% from its latest reported closing price of $42.04 / share. 

See our [leaderboard of companies](https://fintel.io/sfo) with the largest price target upside.

The projected annual revenue for Newmont is 11,605MM, a decrease of 31.68%. The projected annual non-GAAP [EPS](https://fintel.io/seps/us/nem) is 2.17. 

**What is the Fund Sentiment?**

There are [1,978 funds or institutions reporting positions](https://fintel.io/so/us/nem) in Newmont. This is an increase of 101 owner(s) or 5.38% in the last quarter. Average portfolio weight **of all funds** dedicated to NEM is 0.46%, an increase of 10.46%. Total shares owned by institutions increased in the last three months by 1.86% to 940,006K shares. ![NEM / Newmont Corporation Put/Call Ratios](https://images.fintel.io/us-nem-put-call-ratio-chart.png) The [put/call ratio](https://fintel.io/sopt/us/nem) of NEM is 0.64, indicating a bullish outlook. 

**What are Other Shareholders Doing?**

![NEM / Newmont Corporation Shares Held by Institutions](https://images.fintel.io/us-nem-so.png)

BlackRock holds 120,301K shares representing 10.61% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 119,251K shares , representing **an increase** of 0.87%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in NEM by 19.44% over the last quarter. 

Van Eck Associates holds 48,950K shares representing 4.32% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 50,918K shares , representing **a decrease** of 4.02%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in NEM by 4.77% over the last quarter. 

GDX - VanEck Vectors Gold Miners ETF holds 41,436K shares representing 3.66% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 43,624K shares , representing **a decrease** of 5.28%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in NEM by 4.41% over the last quarter. 

VTSMX - Vanguard Total Stock Market Index Fund Investor Shares holds 36,545K shares representing 3.22% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 36,485K shares , representing **an increase** of 0.16%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in NEM by 20.10% over the last quarter. 

VFINX - Vanguard 500 Index Fund Investor Shares holds 30,052K shares representing 2.65% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 29,595K shares , representing **an increase** of 1.52%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in NEM by 19.29% over the last quarter. 

**Newmont Background Information** (This description is provided by the company.)

Newmont is the world's leading gold company and a producer of copper, silver, zinc and lead. The Company's world-class portfolio of assets, prospects and talent is anchored in favorable mining jurisdictions in North America, South America, Australia and Africa. Newmont is the only gold producer listed in the S&P 500 Index and is widely recognized for its principled environmental, social and governance practices. The Company is an industry leader in value creation, supported by robust safety standards, superior execution and technical expertise. Newmont was founded in 1921 and has been publicly traded since 1925. 

##### Stories by George Maybach

[CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont (SNSE:NEM) with Underperform Recommendation](/news/clsa-initiates-coverage-of-newmont-snse-nem-with-underperform-recommendation-735) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, CLSA initiated coverage of Newmont (SNSE:NEM) with a Underperform recommendation.

links.title: RBC Capital Downgrades Applied Therapeutics (APLT)
links.content:
# RBC Capital Downgrades Applied Therapeutics (APLT)

Applied Therapeutics, Inc.

NasdaqGM 

REAL TIME PRICE

EXTENDED HOURS

[Pharmaceutical Preparatio...](/industry/list/pharmaceutical-preparations)  
---  
  
# RBC Capital Downgrades Applied Therapeutics (APLT)

[George Maybach](/author/5244)

2024-11-29 20:59

[US :APLT](/s/us/aplt)

US 

Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, RBC Capital downgraded their [outlook](https://fintel.io/sfo/us/aplt) for Applied Therapeutics ([NasdaqGM:APLT](https://fintel.io/s/us/aplt)) from **Outperform** to **Sector Perform**. 

**Analyst Price Forecast Suggests 52.35% Upside**

As of November 21, 2024, the average one-year [price target](https://fintel.io/sfo/us/aplt) for Applied Therapeutics is $13.06/share. The forecasts range from a low of $11.11 to a high of $14.70. The average price target represents an increase of 52.35% from its latest reported closing price of $8.57 / share. 

See our [leaderboard of companies](https://fintel.io/sfo) with the largest price target upside.

The projected annual revenue for Applied Therapeutics is 6MM. The projected annual non-GAAP [EPS](https://fintel.io/seps/us/aplt) is -1.57. 

**What is the Fund Sentiment?**

There are [247 funds or institutions reporting positions](https://fintel.io/so/us/aplt) in Applied Therapeutics. This is an increase of 118 owner(s) or 91.47% in the last quarter. Average portfolio weight **of all funds** dedicated to APLT is 0.42%, an increase of 18.39%. Total shares owned by institutions increased in the last three months by 15.14% to 125,481K shares. ![APLT / Applied Therapeutics, Inc. Put/Call Ratios](https://images.fintel.io/us-aplt-put-call-ratio-chart.png) The [put/call ratio](https://fintel.io/sopt/us/aplt) of APLT is 1.37, indicating a bearish outlook. 

**What are Other Shareholders Doing?**

![APLT / Applied Therapeutics, Inc. Shares Held by Institutions](https://images.fintel.io/us-aplt-so.png)

Janus Henderson Group holds 10,542K shares representing 9.06% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 7,648K shares , representing **an increase** of 27.45%. The firm **decreased** its portfolio allocation in APLT by 16.17% over the last quarter. 

VR Adviser holds 9,825K shares representing 8.44% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 9,543K shares , representing **an increase** of 2.87%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in APLT by 54.12% over the last quarter. 

Perceptive Advisors holds 8,005K shares representing 6.88% ownership of the company. No change in the last quarter. 

BlackRock holds 6,943K shares representing 5.97% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 6,570K shares , representing **an increase** of 5.37%. The firm **increased** its portfolio allocation in APLT by 78.40% over the last quarter. 

Franklin Resources holds 6,801K shares representing 5.84% ownership of the company. In its prior filing, the firm reported owning 10,213K shares , representing **a decrease** of 50.17%. The firm **decreased** its portfolio allocation in APLT by 79.71% over the last quarter. 

**Applied Therapeutics Background Information** (This description is provided by the company.)

Applied Therapeutics is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company developing a pipeline of novel drug candidates against validated molecular targets in indications of high unmet medical need. The Company's lead drug candidate, AT-007, is a novel central nervous system penetrant aldose reductase inhibitor (ARI) for the treatment of Galactosemia, a rare pediatric metabolic disease. The Company initiated a pivotal Phase 1/2 clinical trial in June 2019, read out positive top-line biomarker data in adult Galactosemia patients in January 2020 and announced full data from the trial in April 2020. A pediatric Galactosemia study commenced in June 2020. The Company is also developing AT-001, a novel potent ARI that is being developed for the treatment of Diabetic Cardiomyopathy, or DbCM, a fatal fibrosis of the heart. The Company initiated a Phase 3 registrational study in DbCM in September 2019. The preclinical pipeline also includes AT-003, an ARI designed to cross through the back of the eye when dosed orally, for the treatment of diabetic retinopathy, as well as novel dual PI3k inhibitors in preclinical development for orphan oncology indications. 

##### Stories by George Maybach

[CLSA Initiates Coverage of Newmont (SNSE:NEM) with Underperform Recommendation](/news/clsa-initiates-coverage-of-newmont-snse-nem-with-underperform-recommendation-735) Fintel reports that on November 29, 2024, CLSA initiated coverage of Newmont (SNSE:NEM) with a Underperform recommendation.
